sentences.en: Also, two unique injector types, representing departures from the conventional axial injection scheme, are also discussed.
sentences.cn: 此外, 还讨论了两种独特的喷注器型式, 这些型式不同于常规的轴向喷射方式.

sentences.en: An axial electron pair meets at right angles with 3 neighboring pairs.
sentences.cn: 轴向电子对与三个相邻的电子对相交成直角.

sentences.en: An axial vector may itself enter into a vector product.
sentences.cn: 轴矢量自身可参与矢积.

sentences.en: Angular momentum is an axial vector quantity.
Efficacy measures include axial length, keratometric power and mean absolute refractive error.
sentences.cn: 有效测量值包括眼轴长度, 角膜曲率和绝对屈光误差值等内容.

sentences.en: How many radial ( axial ) clearance are there in this bush ( journal bearing, thrust bearing )?
sentences.cn: 这个轴套 ( 轴颈轴承 、 止推轴承 ) 的径向 ( 轴向 ) 间隙是 多少 ?

sentences.en: However, there are two possible axial directions.
sentences.cn: 不过, 沿着轴线也还有两种可能的方向.

sentences.en: In general, the deformation of the model grille is a combination of axial and shear strains.
sentences.cn: 一般情况下, 模型栅格的变形是轴向应变和切向应变的组合.

sentences.en: Neglect the axial deformations and consider only the lumped masses.
sentences.cn: 略去轴向变形不计,仅考虑集中质量.

sentences.en: Patient position: axial coronal and oblique sagittal, supine, prone.
sentences.cn: 扫描方位: 横轴位(Axial)、冠状位(Coronal) 、矢状斜位(Obliquesagittal) 和横轴俯卧位(prone)等.

sentences.en: Polar vectors and axial vectors are distinguished by their inversion properties.
sentences.cn: 极矢量与轴矢量的区别在于它们的反演性质不同.

sentences.en: The axial pump has a broad scope in futu.
sentences.cn: 轴流泵具有广阔的临床应用前景。

sentences.en: The condition of uniaxial stress is closely approximated in prismatic bars subjected to pure axial tensile.
sentences.cn: 单轴的应力状态跟棱柱杆承受单纯轴向拉伸十分近似.

sentences.en: The tank location for these vehicles is chosen for optimum airframe design for axial loads.
sentences.cn: 这些飞行器上的油箱位置是相对轴向载荷作最佳结构设计来选择的.

sentences.en: Those that are aligned perpendicular to the plane are called axial hydrogens.
sentences.cn: 与平面垂直定向的氢叫做直立氢.
